sentences.sContent: If homeowners can't keep up the payments, they face foreclosure.
sentences.sCn: 如果房主不能继续还贷，他们就面临抵押品赎回权被取消的危险。

remMethod.val: fore(预先) + closure(关闭) → 预先关闭了 → 取消抵押品赎回权

words.tran: 阻止；排除；取消抵押品赎回权

trans.tranOther: Foreclosure is when someone who has lent money to a person or organization so that they can buy property takes possession of the property because the money has not been repaid
